testcase.name: Initiate the GET_Card API with valid fields and verify the Expected Result
testcase.system-out: * call read('classpath:reusable.feature') ................................. passed * def testData = read('classpath:com/assignment3/karateFW/testdata/testData.json') . passed * call read('classpath:com/assignment3/karateFWFeature/POST_Password.feature@ResourceOwner') . passed Given url testData.baseURI + testData.Card_Resource +testData.CardFunction . passed And header Authorization = authorization .................................. passed And header Accept = testData.accept ....................................... passed And header uuid = randomString(20) ........................................ passed And header client_id = testData.client_Id ................................. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response.cardDetails == '#present' ................................ passed * match response.cardDetails[0].cardId == '#notnull' ...................... passed * def card_Id = response.cardDetails[0].cardId ............................ passed * print card_Id ........................................................... passed * print '********* Cards Details Generated *********' ..................... passed
